view.figures

Class BaseFigure

  • java.lang.Object
    • view.figures.BaseFigure
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    ArcFigure, Positionable

    public abstract class BaseFigure
extends java.lang.Object
    is superclass of all PetriNetFigures (Arc/Label/Transition/Place)

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      protected class  BaseFigure.AddLabelToConnectableAction
      PopUp-Action for adding a Label to a Connectable (Place/Transition).
      protected class  BaseFigure.DeletePetriNetElementAction
      PopUp-Action for deleting a PetriNetElement from the PetriNet.
